Hello!!! I’ll be honest my mum loves literally everything from Hjh Maimunah but her favorite would definitely be your ayam bakar with spicy chili kicap 🤤 it’s also become our family’s favorite. Visiting Hjh Maimunah at Joo Chiat has been a family tradition for us, we visit every weekend and it’s a bummer we haven’t visited since CB. Please gift this to my mother as she’s your biggest fan, we always over-order when we’re there because we just want to have everything and this would bring back so much memories of dining within the restaurant as a family! Thank you so much for doing this. May your business continue to thrive for many many many years to come inshaAllah 😊
My mom @mariambasir63 favourite dish is Lemak Siput Sedut! 😘

answers.text: @mardhianarahim, Yes Yes! 😋😋 Thk u my boleved daughter. Power..! Lemak Siput Sedut, Hjh Maimunah.👍😍

text:
My mum favourite dish is Sambal Goreng Pengantin cooked with sweet and spicy sauce they trickle her tastebuds which are so SEDAP and BELLY shiok ! 
Followed @hjhmaimunahrestaurant under Instagram handle: @skohhg and FB name: Hock Guan Koh 
Hope to win this special Mother’s Day family meal for my dearest mother @cky3317 and would like to show my heartfelt appreciation by saying a million thanks to her and dedicating this heartfelt poem to my best mum: 
When I was born,
You were there to catch me when i fall, whenever and wherever.
When I said my first words,
You were there for me,
to patiently teach me the whole dictionary.
When I took my first steps,
You were there to encourage me on and telling me not to give up till I succeed.
When I had my first day at school,
you were there beside me, giving me advice and helping me with my homework.
When I had my first day at work, you were there giving me advice and listening to me when I had problems in work,
Until today, deep down in your heart I will always be your "never grow up" child no matter what age I am & you will want to look after me, just like in the past, 
I know you will be there for me, holding my hands tightly and walking through all the good & bad times with me, giving me support along the way with your motherly love !
I Love you Mum now & forever with all my heart for all that you have sacrificed for me & 
I will be filial & make u happy for the rest of my life ! ❤️ M-O-T-H-E-R "M" is for the Million things she gave me,
"O" means only that she's growing Older but Wiser, "T" is for the countless Tears she shed to save me, "H" is for her kind Heart of purest gold,
"E" is for her Eyes, with love-light shining, "R" means Right she'II always be, teaching me the right moral values and also how to differentiate from right and wrong !
My mum's favorite dish is beef rendang!! Tender and succulent beef accompanied with the explosively flavorful stew 🤤
Tahu telur! 🙌 she loves the crisp eggy strands and cannot get enough of the kicap manis! Truly indulgent! ❤️
My mom loves lemak Chili padi!!! ❤️❤️❤️ Spicy but shiok!

Kasih mama nan tiada tandingannya,
Berkorban tenaga, peluh, dan darah;
Babat masak lemak kegemarannya,
Bersama asam pedas ikan merah ☺
.
This is for you mama @riahris 💙 my mum rly loves @hjhmaimunahrestaurant 's babat masak lemak and asam pedas ikan merah! .
Melangkah ke dusun gadis berseri,
Sekuntum nan wangi terselip di tepi;
Hamba menyusun sepuluh jari,
Berharap menangi hadiah diimpi ✨

answers.text: @hazumarill Waaaahhhh.... MashaAllah.  Terimakasih bnyk anak ku sayang 😘😍👏👏👏🏻 💗💗💗. In Shaa Allah terpilih kalau ada rezki 😊

text: Lemak chili padi are my mum's fav dish.. !!! Other dishes awesome too.. we will never ever forget!! 🤲🤗🙏😍
My mom loves asam pedas ♥️
Ayam lemak chilli padi and beef rendang is my mum's fav main dish😍😋 never fail to order this 2 dishes and the taste always never fail us🙌❤️
My mom's fav the lemak chili padi,ayam masak...😋😋😋
Liked and followed! Mum’s favourite dish is definitely beef rendang! Hoping to win this!!! ☺️✨☘️👍🏻🔥

My mom has so many favourite dishes and it’s so hard to narrow down to one but I’ll say it will have to be the ASSAM PEDAS! The more pedas it is, the better!! 😍 Even though we can’t spend Mother’s Day together because of the circuit breaker, I know she would be over the moon to celebrate with super sedap food from @hjhmaimunahrestaurant! 😋

My mum loves the opor nangka. In fact, she says it's the best she's ever tasted & you can only find it at hajjah maimunah. Before the circuit breaker, we would always have lunch as a family at hajjah maimunah geylang after our weekly marketing. My mum missed the dishes so much that we pre-ordered the delicious dishes and self collected for her birthday in March. Hope she gets to taste her favorite dish again for iftar during this Ramadhan. :)
My mom’s all time favourite is lemak siput sedut! Always fresh and never disappoint her.
beef rendang ❤️

My mom will like to have lemak nangka goes well with ikan pari bakar air tapai ubi for the drinks and for dessert she loves to eat bubur terigu  I know its old school but it has got sentimental value I guest❤️😍😂
My mom’s fav dish is beef rendang! The last time she had it was months ago and I really want to surprise her with it for Mothers Day!! 💛
My mom's favourite dish would be the classic Beef Rendang because she's a simple & humble person just like the dish itself😌

My mum likes too many dishes!!!! But I think her fav should be beef rendang, cos she never fails to order that whenever we are there. Hope to win this for her for mother's day! Thank you for hosting this giveaway ❤️🌟
Ibu suka makan ikan bakar,kuih muih , lemak siput sedut,Telor ikan Asam pedas dan tahu telur! tu fav ibu tu kalau mkn di hajjah maimunah.

My mum loves the Beef Rendang! Eversince I was a little girl, my mum would always get your signature beef rendang and other dishes for our family to feast on. Since it will be her birthday tomorrow, i hope to win this for her. As we cant get to iftar and celebrate her birthday due to the crisis now, this meal will definitely brighten up her day and lit up the mood for her birthday. Thank you @hjhmaimunahrestaurant ❤️
Beef Rendang! Both my mum’s and my favourite! 😋 I’m salivating just thinking of it.
Hip hip hooray to Thai Telur & Sambal Sotong for The Queen!! 🤤🌟💫
My mom loves the barbecue sea bass! ❤️
My mom like to eat rendang beef...and pengat pisang...remind her of her hometown in indo
🙌 hand down her fav is lemak siput sedut and lemak  turi... seeing her eat those dishes whenever I bring her there make made smile from ear to ear
My single mum@love ur Urap,siput sedut,beef rendang , ikan Bakar and of course the Kuih Kuih especially badak berendam super sedap !!
@shotsbybread good things must be shared!! i know u guys love malay food too especially the BEEF RANDANG!! hope we can win for our mother’s!! 👍🏻👍🏻 yummyyy

@charlztang my mom grew up with many malay neighbours and was v v blessed to be able to try many variety of malay food!! as she grew up in a less fortunate household, eat things like beef, prawn or even stingray is considered a luxuary! so everything she have asam pedas stingray, it remains her slot of her childhood! Really really really hope to be able to win this for her as it would truly make it the best mother’s day for her!! ASAM PEDAS STINGRAY!! 👍🏻👍🏻
my mom ❤️ the bbq seabass! She loves the sauce that comes with it and especially enjoys cleaning up the bones after we are all done with it!

Since i dont have mom (alfateha to her), i am doing this for myself coz i am a mom too and i deserve this for myself. Been cooking for my family all their favourite dishes, so its time someone do the cooking for me. So my favourite dish would be AYAM BAKAR SUNDANESE ❤️. Love the marinates. Perfect charness of the chicken. Love the balance of sweet spicy & sour sauce. 🔥

Lemak Ayam Cili Padi.  Hope to win for my mummy for the upcoming mother’s day 
She deserves to be pampered because

She met my dad 34 years ago. She was really brave and agreed to my father to give birth to me in Singapore so that I can have a better life and education over here.

When she came over, she has faced a lot of difficulties adapting to the lifestyle as compared to her village lifestyle. Everything she has to learn from scratch such as communications and many more. 
Since we were young, she has to use her own methods of giving us English and Mandarin spellings using Thai pinyin. She also learns how to cook our Chinese food so that we can have a warm home cooked dinner when we came back from school or work.

30 years ago, her relationship with my father was turned sour.  In order for us to have a complete family, she gave up her own happiness and she bears with him for so many years till now.

When I gave birth about 4 years ago, she helped us to take care of baby from days to nights. We can see the tiredness from her eyes but she was not complaining at all. 
Last year, I brought her for checkup and from there we realized that she actually suffered from minor strokes long time ago and we children we were not aware of it. We felt so embarrass and regrets towards to our mother as she always care for us and we are not realize that she was sick all these while . The doctor asked us to admit her straightaway as her blood pressure was too high. After some checkups done at hospital, we found out that she has diabetes, high blood pressure and high cholesterol.  We asked her to stop taking care of her grandson and have a good rest at home.

She has done a lot of things and sacrifices for this family. Her efforts are very appreciated by us. I would like to thank GOD for giving us such a good mother who sacrifices so much for us and she has never expected anything back from us. @hjhmaimunahrestaurant

My mom’s favourite dish is asam pedas ikan pari! My mom and I live countries apart and we are missing each other terribly. Hope to win this to cheer her up a little this Mothers Day. And she is a May baby too!
Celok ikan tongkol. Mum dun usu prep em coz shes a Javanese. She tasted the one done by my MIL & was blown away! 💁

How do we pick a favourite when all the dishes are so good!! 😍 My mom's favourite @hjhmaimunahrestaurant dish is their BEEF RENDANG! Hands down, THE BEST BEEF RENDANG IN TOWN!! 🙌 Her second favourite would be the Lemak Siput Sedut. (Not to forget their signature Sambal Belacan on the side. Syiokkk!) Our must haves whenever we eat at Hjh Maimunah. Love how dining at Hjh Maimunah brings so many fond memories of my childhood with my mom & late grandma too. Thank you @hjhmaimunah for preserving various Malay delicacies for us & for the future generation to come. Alhamdulillah! 💕

Lemak Ayam Cili Padi is her favourite 😍

The dishes here looks so good and appetising 😍 they will definitely lift my mum’s mood up instantly! there is no love sincerer than the love of food, can't wait to enjoy a hearty and satisfying feasting with my family 😋 enjoying good food together is the best way for bonding!!! My mom is the most important person to me and she is my super hero. My mom is the best because she's my biggest supporter and always have my best interest at heart. During my university days, when I am always studying late at night till 2-3am, she will ensure that I don’t go hungry by preparing supper for me. No matter is it primary school, secondary school, junior college or when choosing university courses, she always make sure she’s there to listen and give advice. Now that I’m married, she is still there to teach me how to cook and manage household matters. She love me for who I am. She’s my lifelong mentor. No matter what time it is or how busy she is, I can count on her to be there for me. I’m very fortunate that I can always turn to her and there was never a time where I felt that I'm alone. She love me for who I am. I'm grateful for her and I appreciate the role she play in my life ❤️ I am thankful to have grown up in a family full of love, laughter and memories that will live on forever. I love my mum the most ❤️
Asam pedas! but because we don't really love it as much as her, she always sacrifice by cooking what we like instead.
My mum loves sambal goreng...this mother day I hope to win this for her as she will turn 70 this year...thanks for hosting the giveaway
Asam pedas kepala ikan!
AYAM BAKAR AND TAHU TELORRRRRR. Give her any of those and she will senyap makan hahahahah. 😎
Salam. Me mum likes the tahu telor and sup buntut 😋
My mum loves 🐟 so much... and your ikan siakap bakar is one of her favs! ❤️
